summary: Hardworking, Good Communication Skills, Love to bike

responsibilities: Collaborated with a multidisciplinary team to co-design and develop technology solutions addressing social, economic, and environmental challenges.
Participated in workshops and discussions, gaining hands-on experience in DevOps, Agile practices, and industry research methodologies.
Contributed to the research and development of sustainable technology initiatives under the guidance of industry experts and academic experts from UK.
Performed data exploratory data analysis and supported the training of data using pandas/numpy and libraries.
Helped strengthen the speed of data. Also performed the scraping and crawling of data from the web through requests and beautiful soup.

trainingCertifications.title: MERN Stack
details: The MERN stack is a collection of JavaScript-based technologies used for building web applications. MERN stands for MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, and Node.js.
Gained practical skills in full-stack JavaScript development with a unified language.
Subjects: Python, ASP.NET, PHP, Data Structures/Algorithms, Object-Oriented Programming (Java).
